data.why:
Some usefull scripts I have written. The first: foldoc2docbook -
    build a docbook glossary for items requested from a DICT server

    This is a simple script which illustrates use of the Net::Dict perl
    module to get items from a DICT server.

    In xml mode, each items read from STDIN or inputfile will be
    requested to the desired DICT server and the output is transformed
    to a docbook glossary form and printed to STDOUT.

    Claus
